name: Cambodian Bicycle Coalition
goal:
The Cambodian Bicycle Coalition represents the interests of
bike manufacturers on issues affecting exports to the EU ; CBC aims at maintaining a sustainable and fair trade between our members and the EU
interests: Business and Industry, Customs, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Trade
euInitiatives: EU Trade decisions affecting the supply chain of bike manufacturers to the EU ; EU Trade negotiations with ASEAN countries ; Review of the GSP regulation;  EU withdrawal process of Cambodia's eligibility to the EBA program.
